original_text: And they said unto them, The Lord look upon you, and judge; because ye have made our savour to be abhorred in the eyes of Pharaoh, and in the eyes of his servants, to put a sword in their hand to slay us.
korean_text: 그들에게 이르되 너희가 우리를 바로의 눈과 그의 신하의 눈에 미운 것이 되게 하고 그들의 손에 칼을 주어 우리를 죽이게 하는도다 여호와는 너희를 살피시고 판단하시기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: The Lord look upon you, and judge
because ye have made our savour to be abhorred
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 우리의 향기를 혐오스럽게 만들었기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: in the eyes of Pharaoh, and in the eyes of his servants
to put a sword in their hand
